CustomField.defaultValue: "1. Volumes <100K will be charged at the published rate card pricing and will not qualify for a contract rate. 2. For Premium service and rates, please contact UMS Product/Pricing Specialist. More details is available on the product factsheet. To access the factsheet, you can copy and paste the following URL to your internet browser - https://auspost.com.au/business/marketing-and-communications/business-letter-services/bulk-mail-options/unaddressed-mail#tab4"
CustomField.inlineHelpText: 1. Volumes <100K will be charged at the published rate card pricing and will not qualify for a contract rate. 2. For Premium service and rates, please contact UMS Product/Pricing Specialist. More details is available on the product factsheet. To access the factsheet, you can copy and paste the following URL to your internet browser - https://auspost.com.au/business/marketing-and-communications/business-letter-services/bulk-mail-options/unaddressed-mail#tab4
CustomField.label: Help Text
